text.p: At the start of the environment turn, place 2 tokens on this card
At the end of the environment turn, move this card next to the target with the highest HP
When this card is destroyed, it deals X damage to the target it is next to, where X is the number of tokens on this card
At the start of the environment turn, remove this card from the game (even if it is indestructible)
All cards are indestructible
All cards are immune to damage
Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1
Whenever damage would be dealt to heroes, redirect it to this card

When this card enters play reveal the top card of each deck, starting from the villain, in turn order. If the card is an Ongoing, Equipment or Device, put it into play. Otherwise shuffle it back into the deck
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card
At the end of the environment turn this card deals 1 fire damage to the target with the highest HP
At the end of the environment turn this card deals 1 cold damage to the target with the highest HP
At the end of the environment turn this card deals 1 lightning damage to the target with the highest HP
At the end of the environment turn this card deals 1 energy damage to the target with the highest HP
Whenever a target would be dealt lightning damage, redirect the damage to this card
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals all targets 2 fire damage
If a target is dealt cold damage, destroy this card
When this card enters play, place three tokens on it. If it ever has no tokens on it, remove it from the game
At the end of the environment turn, remove the non-character-card Parahuman with the lowest HP from the game. If you do, remove a token from this card
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck
At the start of the environment turn, if this is the only environment card in play, destroy it
At the end of the environment turn, place a token on this card
At the start of the environment turn, deal X energy damage to all targets, where X is the number of tokens on this card. If there are no tokens on this card, destroy it
Whenever a target regains HP, remove a token from this card
At the start of the environment turn, play the top card of the villain trash
When this card is put into play, destroy all non-character-card cards in play except this card
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card
When this card is put into play, deal 3 lightning damage to all hero targets
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card
Reduce damage dealt to the villain target with the highest HP by 1
If the villain target with the highest HP is dealt 4 or more damage in a single instance, destroy this card
Whenever damage would be redirected from one hero target to another, increase the damage by 2
If a hero target deals damage to another hero target, destroy this card
